channel.title: Come get me Uzuki :)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Come get me Uzuki :)"

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Actually I can't apply to DP because my main character is there.LOL

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
@darkmagician_03: As posted on Welcome thread:

Join one of villages allied with the Wiki.

Villages have so far:

Dotaportal - 29 nins
Majinobi - almost full nins
Moon - 32 nins
Norse - 23 nins

To make Wiki strong make allies strong(if the Wiki is full :P )

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
My alt just applied on The Wiki village.
Hope I can join.Thanks in advance.
Name is DareDevil.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Just applied, and waiting for an acceptance.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Gotcha.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Just applied, and currently waiting for you to accept.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Come and get me, I just applied.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Roger that, looking forward to having you!

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: And I just left my current village. I can't apply for another two days, so expect an application from me around then.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Just turned in my app Uzuki! Please accept me soon.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Sounds good! We've got our Jonin Council available for when you join now! Was a good day today, bought the War Council and Jonin Council, so we're really set to hit the ground running.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
Alright Uzuki, I left my village. It turns out I'm not going to wait till I get to name my sword, and I'm only a couple levels till i get past 40 (again). I made the decision yesterday because I got a little aggro when I clicked the "Completed 72 Hours" button on the Three Days in a Hole Special Mission, only to find that I was ELEVEN MINUTES off. Thus, I have to wait again.

So, expect to see my application in a couple of days. I'm genuinely excited to join :D

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: No problem. I'd much prefer people play the game in the way that suits them best over dropping everything to help out with Wiki :)

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Really early perhaps, but from the looks of it, growing fast. Koukon Village, on the other hand, isn't growing at all. Give me a few days to think about it because I'm not absolutely sure.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: We're currently at 24, not including Jupiah. We had a couple Genin and Chunin apply earlier today. I'm quite happy with the pace that the Village is growing, but it really is important to note that we're still really early in the Village history. We'll enter the War tomorrow (and if I'm right, get a Jonin Council too), but there's not much more that our Village has right now.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
I'm considering applying too. I'm gettting pretty dissatisfied with my current villiage, and would much rather be part of one that's actually being successfull and not changing hands every third day. (We went through three villiage leaders in the past week.)

However, I really don't want to be part of a particularly small villiage, and I noticed that you said you have 17 members now (18, perhaps 19 including Jupiah and the person you referred to). If your villiage can reach 20-25 in the next few days, then let me know and I'll see about appying. I'd much rather be part of a villiage that seems like it's going somewhere, than my current one.

So keep me updated, and I'll keep checking the forums here for info about how you're doing.

By the way, I'm a level 36 Jounin (probably 38 by the end of the day), in case you're curious.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear it Jupiah!

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: I've decided to leave my village today. I'll be applying at Wiki Village as soon as I'm able to.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Sounds great. Actually, the way things are looking, it's entirely possible that we'll have enough people to get our Jonin council the same day as we enter the war. Currently we're sitting at 17 people who count (and 1 who's not counting due to a duplicate IP issue that I'm not clear on yet). I think at least 1 more is planning on joining us, that I'm aware of. So we just need to have 2 people join to have the numbers for the Jonin council.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: i'll join soon enough, once my character gets his reaper jutsu and at least lvl 40, when I reckon i can be of help. (i'm Captain, btw)

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: I'm goin to send an app soon, I just have to wait for to get rid of the damn Village lock, which stays for two full days after leaving a Village

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Cool… I have 3 different Villages :)

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: It only matters if they're in the same village. If they're in different villages it doesn't matter.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Does that duplicated IP count for me too? I have 3 accounts and I use them all from the same IP…

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Ya, we've got 14 right now I think, and if I'm tracking right, at least 2-3 more are going to join still. Though, we've got a duplicate IP issue that I'd prefer to have sorted out.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Nice all from Wikidot is joining the Village :)…

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: I applied with a sub account of mine.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Not a problem. I'll let him in the moment I see an App :) Good to have ya.

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
yay ^_^ no more rogue chunin. time to go update my history a bit…

Oh, Firedruid9 may put in an application. let him join if you like, he was one of the people in the village I left who was really nice

item.title: Re: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded: Done.

item.title: Come get me Uzuki :)
item.content:encoded:
It finally let me apply again. Come get me ^_^

Oh, and I guess that means I can be moved on the players list at last :)
